text: Charles Carver MartensenCalifornia Birth Index 1905â€“1995, Ancestry.com (born July 31, 1988), known professionally as Charlie Carver, is an American actor. His best known roles include Porter Scavo on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives and Ethan on the MTV television series Teen Wolf.Interview with Charlie and Max Carver His identical twin brother Max Carver has played the twin of his characters. Carver is openly gay. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1988 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:LGBT actors Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from California Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Charlie Carver
